text: Pyotr Petrinich (born 20 December 1957) is a Belarusian rowing cox. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Belarusian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Unified Team Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Brest, Belarus Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Pyotr Petrinich
